name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search on Amazon - Effortless Product Search on Amazon - Amazon Search

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search on Amazon: Quickly search products on Amazon (Alt + 1), supports 19 sites. Boost productivity & save time!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*************************************Affiliate Disclosure****************************************
How does it work? 
ðŸ‘‰Upon searching using this tool and If you make a purchase, I may receive a commission. This tool is free to use, and the sole source of my income is through affiliate programs or donations. Your support is greatly appreciated.

My extension uses affiliate programs to help support its development and maintenance. This means that when you click on links to search for items on Amazon and make a purchase, I may earn a commission at no additional cost to you. I appreciate your support!
*************************************************************************************************

Supports 19 amazon sites

Are you tired of the hassle of searching for products on Amazon? with Chrome extension, you can easily find what you need with just a few clicks.

SOA simplifies your Amazon shopping experience by allowing you to search for products on Amazon with just a few keystrokes. Simply highlight the text you want to search for, then press Alt+1 or right-click and select "Search on Amazon" to instantly find the best results.

Whether you're looking for the latest tech gadget, a new book, or a favorite brand, our extension makes it easy to find exactly what you're looking for. 

I will be adding more feature to it like a filter
